name: Cutwright: Full Auto
description:
"Cutwright: Full Auto" follows the adventure of the famous Twitch streamer, Cutwright! He is fed up with the harassment from his mods, and decides to take matters into his own hands. Fight your way through hordes of creatures based on the mods from the Cutwright channel. Featuring Broccoli, TheDedlySeagull, RedPandaManda, and a few surprises.

Based on the Cutwright Twitch Channel:

https://www.twitch.tv/cutwright

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Space - Jump

Left Click - Shoot

Right Click - Interact

Y - Use unlocked Sprays

P = Return to Main Menu

Credits: Jordan "Cutwright" Woodruff Broccoli RedPandaManda TheDedlySeagull Matt_Rushmore - - - Voices by: Roman Flock Revan Flock - - - Music by: Cleyton Kauffman Matthew Pablo Patrick DeArteaga Avidmoviegoer Brandon Morris PMSFX Anttis Instrumentals - - - Special thanks to: Shaun Spalding Kat "FiestyBanana" McCartney Michael "workinproqress" Peel
